properties.name: active
properties.description: Number which describes index of chosen by default item

properties.name: tabs
properties.description: is an object, which can have next props:

subProperty.name: text
subProperty.description: is string. This property is required.

subProperty.name: disabled
subProperty.description: is a boolean which describes if tab disabled

subProperty.name: hidden
subProperty.description: is a boolean which describes if tab hidden

properties.name: simpleTabs
properties.description: When setup as true, turning on styles mode for tabs different from the default styles

properties.name: tabsAlign
properties.description: Allow justify tabs by next values: center, flex-start, flex-end, space-between

properties.name: enableLoader
properties.description: Control displaying of Loader component above the content of Tabs component

properties.name: additionalContentStyles
properties.description: Object of styles for additional container

events.name: tab
events.description: Return tab's configuration object and it's index
